# Unity generated
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/

# .DS_Store files
.DS_Store

# User-specific files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.user
*.pidb
*.userprefs
*.bak
*.cache
*.vs/

# Unity3D generated meta files
*.pidb.meta

# Unity3D Generated File On Crash Reports
sysinfo.txt

# macOS specific files
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# Thumbnails
._*

# Files that might appear on external disk
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes

# Compiled bytecode
*.dll
*.pdb
*.mdb

# Logs
*.log

# Android build artifacts
/*/build/
/*/gen/
/*/bin/

# iOS build artifacts
*.hmap
*.ipa
*.xcworkspace

# Cache files for Visual Studio and MonoDevelop
*.cache
*.csproj.DotSettings.user
*.pidb
